ing: 1 (1 ounce) package ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley Ranch Â®)
1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
n: No Cook Pretzels with a Kick
des: "A spicy snack of pretzels with no baking required. Great for parties or poker night!"
ins: Place vegetable oil, ranch dressing mix, garlic powder, lemon pepper, and cayenne pepper in a gallon-size resealable bag; seal and gently shake to mix oil with dry ingredients. Add pretzels and seal bag; shake to thoroughly coat pretzels with seasoned oil. Let pretzels marinate in the bag for 30 minutes. Shake bag and marinate another 30 minutes. Transfer pretzels to a paper towel-lined baking sheet to dry.
